1939
March 6,
Mr. H. Bm Novik
Municipal Broadcasting System
Municipal Building
New York City
Dear Mr. Novik:
The National Association of Educational Broadcasters
cordially invites you to associate with it as a
NAEB member*
Enclosed you will fine a copy of the Association
revised constitution which will give you information
regarding the organisation.
May I explain that NAEB sends to ita members a News
Letter containing collected ana selectea information
on educational activities in general, in particular
about NAEB members, and occasional special articles
by competent authorities. The News Letters are
mailed members twice monthly except June, July, and
August, when publication is monthly.
Collected educational radio information is also
exchanged by members and distributed monthly.
Annual dues for your institution, as provided in
the Constitution, would be $10 for annual membership.
I shall be glad to send you fu ther data, or would be
most happy to receive your 1939 dues.
GCoralally yours,
Frank E. Schooley
